message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm really interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $125?

I understand that $150 is a bit steep for you, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I can offer you a compromise at $135. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $135 is still a bit too high for me. I'd be willing to pay $115 for the product. Can you meet me at that price?

I understand that $115 is still a bit below my target, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer you $130. It's the lowest I'm willing to go, but I think it's a fair price for this amazing product. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $130 is still a bit too high for me. I'd be willing to pay $125 for the product. Can you meet me at that price?
